= abci =

|| [https://code.google.com/p/fittest/source/browse/#svn%2Ftrunk%2Fsub-projects%2Flogtools%2Fabci%2Fv1%253Fstate%253Dclosed src] || [https://code.google.com/p/fittest/source/browse/trunk/sub-projects/logtools/abci/v1/docs/index.html doc] || download ||

Abci is an instrumentation tool to inject low-level logging code into a target application. The application is in !ActionScript bytecode, packaged as a Flash .swf file.
